classic.title: Guess the Warframe
classic.subtitle: Take a guess to get started
Simply type in the name of a Warframe and it will reveal its properties
classic.feedback_explanation: The color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the Warframe to find.

properties.red_explanation: indicates there is no overlap between your guess and the property
properties.green_explanation: indicates the property is an exact match.
properties.arrows: With arrows, it also indicates if the answer property is above or below your guess.

sex.title: Sex:
sex.description: It is a match because both are the same sex

health.title: Health:
health.description: Nezha has less health than Inaros

shield.title: Shield:
shield.description: Nezha has more shields than Inaros

progenitor.title: Progenitor:
progenitor.description: It is a match because both have the same progenitor element

classic.correct_guess: If you entered Nezha, here is what would come up:

ability.title: Guess the Warframe the ability belongs to in
ability.subtitle: Which each guess, more of the ability icon will be revealed.
